title: x/net/http2: h2c support
body:
Currently `net/http2` only [support h2](https://github.com/golang/net/blob/a7d8d4e9cf35160cb1eea937af7abfd3bd469697/http2/http2.go#L38). According to the HTTP2 spec, it can also run over [straight TCP (h2c) instead of TLS](http://http2.github.io/http2-spec/index.html#versioning). I wonder what's the roadmap for it.

/cc @bradfitz
